title: Call for a wording check: error messages on an incomplete application draft
body_html:
The validity of an open application draft can be checked as of 32c7d39 . (Go to the botton and click the 'Check' button). You'll get a number of error messages that are defined in config/locales/en.yml.

I think the wording of some of these could be better so I am open for suggestions. Better yet: file a PR 😄
